targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM system WITH KEY = host
SELECT SUM(cpus) AS cpus FROM (SELECT LAST("n_cpus") AS cpus FROM "system" GROUP BY host) GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(total) AS total FROM (SELECT LAST("total") AS total FROM "mem" GROUP BY host) GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(total) AS total FROM (SELECT LAST("total") AS total FROM "disk" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(used) AS used FROM (SELECT LAST("used") AS used FROM "disk" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(total) AS total FROM (SELECT LAST("total") AS total FROM "processes" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "cpu" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT SUM(total) AS total FROM (SELECT LAST("total") AS total FROM "disk" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(used) AS usado FROM (SELECT LAST("used") AS used FROM "disk" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT SUM(total) AS total FROM (SELECT LAST("total") AS total FROM "processes" GROUP BY "host") GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(e) AS entrada FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "e"  FROM "net" WHERE (interface =~ /$interface/)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT SUM(s) AS salida FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "s" FROM "net" WHERE (interface =~ /$interface/)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT SUM(e) AS establecidas FROM (SELECT last("tcp_established") AS "e" FROM "netstat" GROUP BY "host") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT SUM(l) AS escuchando FROM (SELECT last("tcp_listen") AS "l" FROM "netstat" GROUP BY "host") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" GROUP BY "laboratory"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=laboratory
list.label: Laboratorio
list.name: laboratory
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=laboratory

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE laboratory =~ /$laboratory/
list.label: Equipo
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE laboratory =~ /$laboratory/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
